comments.author: Joe Zack
comments.message: The info page refers to it as a "development tool", so I don't know that it will necessarily be an actual stand-alone IDE.

comments.author: Joe Zack
comments.message:
...And then I clicked on the link to Kristen Schofield's blog and saw the letters: "IDE".

Sorry about that!

comments.author: Akbarsait
comments.message: Yes you can get more information about BOLT IDE at Jason Delmore's blog as well.
